author: Manu Pubby
title: Empowered groups to set up single platform to fight Coronavirus
description: The committee on communication and information will work closely with the regional media as well and is looking at addressing the psychological impact of the lockdown by coming up with a strategy to motivate people during the 21-day ‘stay at home’ directive.
content: New Delhi: Empowered groups of officials mandated to fight the Covid-19 crisis have started work, with one of the first steps likely to be the creation of a single platform for people who wish to collaborate with the government by offering technology or manuf… [+1282 chars]
